law.history: Amended 2007 Ky. Acts ch. 85, sec. 322, effective June 26, 2007. -- Amended 1992 Ky. Acts ch. 211, sec. 101, effective July 14, 1992. -- Amended 1982 Ky. Acts ch. 344, sec. 53, effective July 15, 1982. -- Amended 1974 Ky. Acts ch. 74, Art. V, sec. 24(14); and ch. 308, sec. 63. -- Created 1972 Ky. Acts ch. 293, sec. 1.
